docs.title: How do I get a new SIM Card to switch my old phone to a different line on my account?
docs.text: t the moment i have an iphone 5s but i just bought an iphone 6s and am giving my daugher my old phone. she already has a line on my plan but the phone iphone 4 she was using broke and since 4's and 5s's don't use the same sim card i need a new one for her. i don't know what i'm doing wrong and i've talked to a represenative through chat twice. the 1st person told me how to order one, which i had already tried but i tried again anyways and it still didn't work. the second person told me to just try putting the card from the 4 into the 5s and it should work but i already know that the 4's used micro-sims and the 5's use nano-sims. i live 60 miles away from the nearest wwireless store so i'd prefer to order a new one online if possible.i know the iemi is good, the phone was bought by my through wwireless and its 100% paid for but everytime i try to add it to my cart an error pops up saying (erroraddingitemtocart) but no explanations as to why.any advice/information will be greatly appreciated. thanks.

docs.title: I don't understand why?
docs.text: followed the steps to request unlock coed from wwireless. one step was to enter some info to determine if my tablet is eligible for sim unlocking #1. ask if you are a customer with an account, with a yes box or a no box. i do not so i checked the no box. #2. asks for the devices imei#, i put it in and proceeded to #3. everytime i tap the box to enter the info for that one it refreshes and puts a box right above #2 stating that the info i entered for imei# is not an wwireless. need to check # again and reenter it. ok i have checked it, double checked, triple checked, quadruple checked, and even one more time. the number is the same as i entered the first time. how do i find out if it is eligible to unlock?

docs.title: In need of a replacement device that works, Customer Service that actually helps!
docs.text: am extremely frustrated!after one month of waiting, due to local representative never filing a complaint despite my follow-up status requests, while paying wwireless for a new phone along with its non-existent service, i received a refurbished replacement phone from wwireless which has also stopped working!i have now been paying a total of three months for not only a not working $800 plus dollar phone (payment plan) but for your service which i have been unable to use unless i use my xfinity cable or other wifi..representatives at local wwireless store are useless, uninterested in helping customers who pay their salaries - your customers.an example - my sim card was removed today, under the pretense i was being given a new sim card to test whether there are "antenna issues" on my iphone. i was dismissed with the words to go to an apple store. i explained since the device was a refurbished device provided by wwireless, apple would not assist - i know this from experience while painfully jumping through the hoops provided by your representatives with the first refurbished replacement wwireless device i received - needless to say, my phone was returned to me with the replacement sim card removed - and my original sim card missing!now i can no longer even use wifi calling to make or receive calls.i was told to go to apple since it was clearly an issue with the device. when i explained the device was purchased at your store, the device was a refurbished replacement received weeks ago, and i pay monthly insurance ... i was told there was nothing they could do.when i asked to speak with a manager... i was told to come back another time.i am incredibly angry - have spent countless hours on the phone with customer service, in your stores, in apple stores, and am now here looking for someone with wwireless to help with my issue.

docs.title: The Worst Situation Ever! Arbitration May Not Be Enough!
docs.text: s here's the scoop! i switched to wwireless along with many other now customers at the end of this past year when the iphone 7 became available for sale. i was excited, because for years i had heard about the great service they provided from my co-workers and friends who for many years had service in my area. i loved my new phone and network, and the service was falwless for the first 3-4 months. and then came winter... in the middle of december of 2016 i began to notice that there was increasing instances of my once 4-5 bar power house network, slipping into the 2-3 bar territory. i didn't pay much wwirelessention to it though as my lte and phone service remained strong and consitent during use. and then came jaunuary. in the middle of jaunuary of this year, with no warning at all, my service took a huge dive. when i had data available to use on my plan, it still ran at decreased speeds. on top of that, many of my calls were now frequented with the person on the other line often telling me that they could not here me. or that i sounded like a robot. i immediately took this as someting having malfunctioned in the phone. i called wwireless and decided to figure out how to resolve my issues. they ran a diagnostic on the phone and examined the results only to tell me that my phone was in perfect working order. they ran through other troubleshooting steps, none of which resolved the issue. that's when they decided to check the service in my area. they did so, only to find out that a tower less than an eigth of a mile away from me was severely "degraded", as they put it. still not quite sure what that means. that was on january 24th. i was relieved to know that there was a direct cause to my problems, and that they had a resolution date when the issue would be fixed. but it wasn't. the date for the resolve came and went and i continued to experience issues. i called back a week or so later, only to find out that the same tower was being plagued with the same issues. they gave me a new resolution date, a week or so out and told me to remain patient. which i was, until that date came and went like the first, resulting in more horrible service and a third call, only to find out that the tower was still not in working order. at this point it was the end of february. i asked for what could be done in situations like this and i had to demand compensation for the time of service that had past wihout sound service being delivered. i also asked what could possibly be taking the service this long to resolve. this is a multi billion dollar company we are talking about here. they didn't provide me with much of an answer and instead gave me yet another resolution date, which like its counter parts, failed to resolve any issues. i had to yet again demand more be done about the bill i was being asked to pay, as the service was being impeded by the towers continued struggles. at this point we were in the first week of march and as they began to give me yet another resolution date, i stopped them and requested a list of my options should the service tower continue to plague my area furhter into the coming months. i also asked again what could be taking so long for the tower to be worked on by such a large company. i was given very little info yet again and was told that the only resolve option i had was to leave the service. here's where things get sticky though. the only way i am allowed to leave the service is if i pay off the etf for the remiander of the phone lease. that is the case despite this being a unique situation and that i am a customer at the complete mercy of the now almost two months of tower struggles which i have nothing to do with. in fact that's the only reason i want out of this service. because the tower doens't and hasn't worked in my area. i talked to multiple billing and escalation people within the company all of which say this is the only way out. i don't see this as fair at all and have already begun to seek council about what i should pursue next. here is where wwireless is greatly mistaken.1. not only has my service been impeded due to the tower being down, even until this day. but it has been impeded, for a significant duration of time. a time in which the company failed to notify myself, and any other customers in my area that their service may be affected as a result of the plagued tower. not one call, not one text, not one email. customer service representatives, confirmed for me that wwireless does not notify customers of tower statuses. and even further, there is no way for a customer to know whether service is majorly affected in their area without calling in, because there is no direct page or service provided by wwireless to notify customers of events like mine. they have a mark the spot app, which allows wwireless to collect info from customers who have issues in certain areas, but nothing that specifically reaches out to customer in good faith to say, "hey, we are having issues, but we are working on it. just a heads up". strike one!!2. not only did wwireless fail to notify me of the prolonged tower issues affecting me and others. it also was unwilling, without me demanding it, to add credits to my bill for the time that i had suffered the issues due to the tower being plagued. on three occasions for the past three months i had to request that something be done about the bill. the problem was undeniable and something that could be verified on every level, and yet i met resistance on this. why is it that this company would be willing to fight customers on something they know they aren't providing, as if they have a case to continue to charge you full price, when they know and can confirm they aren't doing their part. strike two!!3. the etf. as i stated before, the tower is still not functioning correctly to this day, and as i write this. yet another, resolution date has passed and i have talked to multiple indivudals at customer service regarding dropping service. but there is one constant. the etf. everyone i speak to wants me to pay 360 dollars to drop my service. that is the remaining cost of the phone as it stands this month. i see this as completely unfair. it is because of wwireless that i am in this predicament. and it is due to an wwireless known issue that has me unsatisfied and wanting to leave. all of the reps said that if i switch networks many of the companies i could go to would be willing to pay up to 600 to add me to their service, but that takes money for me to start. i don't have the money to pay off this phone and leave to start somewhere else. so that means i'd have to by another phone to join in on that network. if i don't have the money to pay this one off and leave, what makes them think i would have the money to just leave and supplement myself; not to maention still have a phone in limbo i have to pay for. what kind of sense does that make? so here's what i did instead. i called and asked to speak to someone in resolutions. my goal was to find out, since i am seemingly stuck with wwireless what my options are, should the tower issues continue to plague my area for some god forsaken reason. i asked, if wwireless would now make an wwirelessempt to contact myself and others struggling with this issue, now that i have raised the compaints about their failure to do so thus far. the asnwer was no. i then asked if i would have to continue to call in and demand credits on a monthly basis due to the towers continued issues,(should they continue to persist) or would someone be monitoring the situation from here on out and make adjustments as necessary. the answer was, most likely i would have to call in. thirdly, i asked if i had a chance to come back should the issues persist over the next few months and re debate the etf issue. to which they said no. does anyone else in the community see a major discrepancy here? wwireless is knowingly failing to hold up their end of the bargain. without my persistence and, awareness, i would be another customer who in this case would be being taken advantage of by a company that is failing to communicate, failing to make up for their wrong on their own, and failing to do the right thing by an honest customer. that's strike three. wwireless you're out! i'm definitely reporting this to the bbc and fcc and i'm going to send this letter to anyone i need to to get this specific message out. this is a blatant wrong doing and this particular situation, in my opinion shows that there are some serious flaws in the wwireless system. i will pursue this to the highest level i can. especially considering that this is an ongoing event. i would appreciate anyones input and recommendations as i move forward. thanks for listening.

docs.title: My account has been erroneously flagged for a debt that does not belong to me.
docs.text: keep having a problem with adding services to my account. i always have to explain to the customer service rep that the account that's being associated with my accountis not mine. my name is totally different, different ssn, and different addresses. this usually takes 2-3 hours to explain after being transferred from dept to dept. not only is this time consuming, but it is embarassing. i tried to add two lines to my wireless account in the store and was told i couldn't. i had to call customer service. i am currently on hold with a customer service rep trying to upgrade my home phone and internet service....and guess what i am once again explaining that this debt does not belong to me. can someone please just tell me what department to contact? i already talked to thefraud dept. and they said it was nothing they could do because the person did not use my information to create this account.

docs.title: ipad:cancellation  due to death
docs.text: m husband passed away on 11/24/16. i have been unsuccessfully trying to cancel his ipad account since that time. i have been to the wwireless store in hanover ma twice with his death certificate and was told the account was cancelled and given a sales receipt by the store manager that shows a zero balance. i have made at least 6 telephone calls each lasting more than one hour with different representatives. i was given a case number by a "loyalty" representative for conflict resolution. i was assured the mwwirelesser would be addressed and resolved and would be called back that afternoon. no call. i keep getting bills with late charges and fees. this has been going on for months. to say i am frustrated is an understatement. my husband was a disabled vietnam vet and i am an elderly woman trying to resolve his affairs . i don't know where to go from here. can someone please help me.ss

docs.text: bought my htc one m9 from bestbuy one year ago. it is an wwireless phone.from day 1 i used the phone with h2o.one month ago, i decided to switch to ctexcel and i transferred my phone number from h2o to ctexcel.but, when i inserted the ctexel sim, i found the phone is locked.i have contacted with wwireless, h2o, ctexcel, and htc. no one cannot lock my phone. i tried ebay.the dealer said he did not have the unlock code for my phone.what should i do?

docs.title: Samsung 7
docs.text: contacted samsung to ask about the weak antenna in the new phones. also asked about during the next upgrade give the uses the ability to change the number of rings before going to vm. i was told that the phones are built to the providers specs and to call the provider. so i ask you wwireless, how do we strengthen the antenna for making phone calls as it appears to be weaker than previous models and how can we ajust the numbers of rings and give me a chance to get to it before going into vm?thanks

docs.title: LG G5 software will not update
docs.text: his morning i received a notification that a software update was available, but that i needed to connect to wifi to download it. i was already connected to my home wifi. i disconnected wifi and restarted the phone. nothing. i went into settings to try it manually and it says 'continue update,' when i press to continue, i get a message that says checking update, but nothing happens. what can i do?

docs.text: h, i've had my wwireless andriod prepaid smart phone for about 2 months. i bought it to take photo's of my jewelry i make so i can then send them to my other phone or email. this has worked great before. but now for some reason it keeps saying "error, can't upload to media" when ever i try sending one. i have data and minutes. please help. i've been on the phone with wwireless 4 different times and recieved no help.

docs.title: No Longer With AT&T, How Do I Update My Phone?
docs.text: couple years ago, i got an htc one (m8) with wwireless as my upgrade. last spring, i switched to google fi, and got a nexus 5x. now it seems that i'm unable to update my htc one (m8), since it's not connected to wwireless anymore, and i can't update via the normal android settings. the only solutions i know of are loading a fresh version of android from scratch, or rejoining wwireless, but i really don't have any interest in either of those.solved!go to solution.

docs.title: Unlocking IPhone (AT&T Lies about time frame)
docs.text: put my request in to have my iphone 6 unlocked. they told me 24-48 hours, well 24-48 hours has passed. so i get into their chat and they say they will escalate it, please wait another 24-48 hours and consider the issue as resolved and it will be guaranteed 101%. it's now been a week and my phone still is not unlocked. i went back in the chat help and a manager named kristine said we are looking on it thanks and disconnected me. has anybody else had this much trouble and lies for getting their iphone unlocked?

docs.title: Horrible experience with AT&T

docs.title: GMC Terrain does not allow me to answer when I get a call. only my Iphone7 does this.
docs.text: an anyone out there help me, please? we have a gmc terrain and i have paired my phone with it. when i get a call, it acts like it is going to answer, but then goes to a screen that asks for a transfer to handset. i have to tell the person to wait while i go through this scenario each time i get a call. my family and friends know to wait so i can hear them, but other people just keep saying hello, hello becasue they cannot figure out why i am not answering.i called wwireless about this and apple about my iphone7. both said they would get back to me and no one has. maybe a community person will know what to do. thanks!
